name: SHMONG
description:
Project realized during a one-week game jam

Have you ever wanted to play pong and a shoot 'em up at the same time?
Fight against not so various foes by reflecting their shots with your shield!
In SPACE! as a CHRONOSPACE delivery man! In a SUSPICIOULSY SMALL SHIP!

Commands :
Controller :
- Twin sticks for your ship and your shield
- RB or LB to parry red shots
Mouse and keyboard :  
WASD your ship only
Left click  to parry

Art by Soares Sébastien
Code by Duponchel Oscar
